context: can you put the shifter on the left hand side
response: Kareem, Your question is a bit confusing to me. The best I can say is the shifter is molded into the wheel, meaning it must remain on the right hand side. I have never seen one with the shifter on the left.Richard

context: Does it come with the white controller and any games?
response: Yes, it does come with the white "I Made This" controller.  There is also the regular black controller that is included with the console, so essentially you will get 2 controllers.  I can also include 2 Xbox One games when you buy the console: Forza Motorsports 5 (Day One version)  and Zoo Tycoon.

context: Noisy Typing? Keyboard looks cool, but I don't want loud clicking when I type.  Can you tell me if this is louder or quieter then your normal keyboard?  Or if it is silent like a laptop?
response: If you want the feel and responsiveness of the mechanical keyboards but the quietness of the laptop keyboards I believe DAS keyboards offers something like that, here http://www.daskeyboard.com/ look for the silent model, it might be worth it if you're going to type in a crowded environment where others might be bothered by the clicky noise.
